newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Akzo Nobel Q1 up in all units bar fibres.
newsitem.headline: Akzo Nobel Q1 up in all units bar fibres.

text.p: Chemical group Akzo Nobel NV said on Friday first-quarter profits rose 2.4 percent to 340 million guilders ($176.3 million), supported by better results in all divisions except fibres and improved exchange rates.
"Pharma, Coating and Chemicals did better than last year, while Fibers reported lower earnings," the company said in a statement.
It added that generally higher currency exchange rates had also had a positive effect on earnings.
Akzo said the fall in operating income at its fibres unit reflected strong price pressure. ($ = 1.928 Dutch Guilders)
